sources.title: OutOfTheFogUK
sources.description: “Underrated gem” “Tidy Thriller” “Excellent B movie” “ Enjoyable” (IMDB reviews quotes). The British cops are on hunt for a serial killer in this solid second feature with a good cast, crisp direction and adequate production values. Not to be confused with the 1941 US film with the same title. IMDB rating 6.3. Directed by Montgomery Tully. Released in 1962. Complete print. AKA “Fog for a Killer”
